name: Dump Truck Trax Abuse
description:
Addictive Dump Truck Drive is all about adventurous Dump Truck Trax that’s full of hasty pace and adrenaline pumping thrills.
Get ready for Addictive adventure challenge.Join the League and be one of the Incredibles. Now you can select your own Dump Truck Trax Tear past the competition while expressing yourself with a variety of wild fight.

Features:
* Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
* Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Animations And Physics
